articles.title: Jake Paul files request to face shock replacement fighter on July 20 instead of Mike Tyson - SPORTbible
articles.description: Jake Paul has sent a request to face a surprise replacement fighter instead of Mike Tyson on July 20.
articles.content:
Jake Paul has sent a request to face a surprise replacement fighter instead of Mike Tyson on July 20.
Paul was due to take on Tyson in Arlington, Texas this summer, with the fight part of Netflix's … [+2791 chars]
